com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.matcher
Class DomainMatcher

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.matcher.DomainMatcher
Direct Known Subclasses:
CoreDomainMatcher
public abstract class DomainMatcher
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a standard base class for extenders of the com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.domains extension point who provide a <validator /> element.

This class is typically extended by a matcher that wants to replace the core matcher completely without any reference to the core matching rules. If one wants the core matching rules, one would extends CoreDomainMatcher instead.

See Also:
CoreDomainMatcher

Returns:

                                      Requirement sourceRequirement,

                                      LinkType[] linkTypes)
